text: The Chain Reaction is a 1980 Australian science fiction action movie directed by Ian Berry and starring Steve Bisley, Hugh Keays-Byrne, Lorna Lesley, Patrick Ward, Richard Moir, Mel Gibson. ==Other websites== * *The Chain Reaction at Oz Movies *The Chain Reaction at Australian Screen Online Category:1980 action movies Category:1980 science fiction movies Category:Australian action movies Category:Australian science fiction movies Category:Movies set in Australia Category:Disaster movies Category:Movies about automobiles Category:Movies about nuclear technology Category:Movies about nuclear accidents
title: The Chain Reaction
